website_summaries.verdict: These affordable Adidas football cleats offer a lot of value for money. For its retail price of just 90 bucks, you’ll get a high-quality cleat that performs well on the field. According to owners, the Adidas Freak X Carbon Mid is a good cleat for linebackers and receivers. These mid-top football cleats are light, supportive, comfortable, and flexible. The cleats also have excellent traction and allow you to move with ease on the gridiron.
pros: These Adidas football cleats look amazing, most buyers comment
They absolutely love the cleat’s colors and design
Nearly all owners are pleased with the performance of the Adidas Freak X Carbon Mid
According to several players, these cleats are very light and are barely noticeable once on-feet
The Freak X Carbon Mid is a very comfortable football cleat, almost players declare
Most wearers love the locked-in feel of these Adidas cleats
According to them, the mid-top collar feels very stable and supportive
Despite its mid-top design, some players are claiming that the collar doesn’t restrict their movements on the field
These football cleats have excellent traction, some users observe
They are saying that the spikes dig into the ground very well
A few players comment that the cleats are quite flexible and easy to break-in
A good number of purchasers love the quality of these Adidas cleats
They claim that these are great cleats, especially for its price
cons: A lot of wearers are complaining that these Adidas cleats are narrow

customer_reviews.title: Love it but a tad loose
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug in the toe and side of the feet portion but only reason u didn't give this a 5 star is the ankle portion seems a little loose to me even when I cinched it up as tight as I could. Also a portion of the toe clear on one of the traction blades is already wearing off after one practice on a turf field. Still holding up well though and has great traction.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S

customer_reviews.title: Can’t pass these up!
customer_reviews.text: My high school football player has extremely large feet. Trying to find cleats in local sporting goods stores that fit him is next to impossible! These cleats arrived quickly, fit him perfectly, were pretty comfy as far as cleats go according to him and have held up amazingly well through a very rainy football season and they were an incredible price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meg C

customer_reviews.title: These cleats are GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son - he loves the way they look and feel. They're especially nice in the heel - there's lot of support for quick turns and fast stops. We have astro turf on our field, not regular grass, and they work really well. We bought a size 9, and they fit him really well. In regular shoes, he wears an 8.5. We'd definitely buy them again!!
customer_reviews.author: D Harris

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait til game day!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a back up pair of cleats for my 16yo. He absolutely loves them! Fit really well and have good support. Size 14
customer_reviews.author: S. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Football season
customer_reviews.text: Need a new pair of cleats every spring and fall. These fit.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Spikes
customer_reviews.text: They're holding up during the on-going football season but too narrow on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great and grippy once I found a size that fit.
customer_reviews.text: These are great but make sure you put some thought into your sizing as it was kinda small for me.
customer_reviews.author: JBB609

customer_reviews.title: Hard to break in
customer_reviews.text: These are ok cleats, the heel has a very uncomfortable backing up the Achilles from the heel, took 3 weeks to break in.

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: my high school son picked them out and loved them

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: The maroon color is a great, true maroon and our school colors. Yay! My 15yr old said they are comfortable and fit well. Hoping to stay with this school during his high school football days.
customer_reviews.author: L. Murrell

customer_reviews.title: Great! Order a half size up.
customer_reviews.text: Based on the other comments, we ordered a half size larger than usual. The season hasn't started yet, but my son says they fit well. Very nice for the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my 13 year old son who decided he wants to play football. He is 5'7" and 95 lbs. He has only used them a handful of times at practice and so far so good. He likes the way they fit and feel. We feel they are a great quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My son requested these for football stated they were comfortable now I had already purchased 3 different cleats that ...
customer_reviews.text: My son requested these for football stated they were comfortable now I had already purchased 3 different cleats that were Nike and he complained about each one so they are practice cleats. These are game day and they match his uniform
customer_reviews.author: Lavette Walker

customer_reviews.title: and says these are the best cleats he's had
customer_reviews.text: My kid plays tight end, outside line backer, and punter, and says these are the best cleats he's had. This is the first time we've used adidas, after having other major brands last a whole season. These were $40 cheaper than buying them locally, so if needed, we'll just order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: S. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Style is nice and not too flashy
customer_reviews.text: Fit my son well, true to size. Style is nice and not too flashy. Not really intended for all day use. He complained that the inserts hurt after the second game of a double header, but that would irritate anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chi

customer_reviews.title: Run a size small
customer_reviews.text: Nice cleats, but they run a size smaller than my son's regular size. Easy exchange through Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Ready for football/great price
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me, I bought them early because my son is now in the grown up/adult prices and this 7.5 was priced on a way if I wanted another color I would have had to put twice as much for one pair than I did for this pair. My son likes this shoe

customer_reviews.title: ... season and my son said that they are more comfortable than his under armor ones he wore last

customer_reviews.text: My son loves these cleats. They fit perfect & they are comfortable. The shipping was a two day shipping so he got them before his first game. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Great
customer_reviews.text: Overall the cleats felt good. It took be about three or so weeks to break them in but truth be told i only wore them 1 time throughout the week. I def recommend them. They feel comfy, have some ankle support and great traction

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is made out of strong material but super, super stiff

I originally had a pair of the Adizero 5 Star 3.0 which were great and flexible. I play ultimate and so it is nice to have flexibility like soccer cleats but the front toe cleat for tight cutting and sprinting.

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Freak X Carbon Mid Football Shoe, Black, 18 Medium US
product_meta.description: Freeze opponents in their tracks. Built for agile footwork, these men's mid-cut football cleats have a lightweight upper made with supportive SPRINTSKIN. A heel cup locks your foot in place, while a strong carbon frame plate offers stability for sharp cuts and stops.
